item.description:
We'll be enjoying weekday happy hour 5:30-7:00pm at a location voted "Best Lounge" by Best of Citysearch: Boston Nightlife. Their fabulous "5-4-3-2-1-0" happy hour menu is valid as long as you have a min $6 beverage:

$5 Flatbreads / $4 Sandwiches / $3 Snacks / $2 Salads / $1 Sweets / $0 Nuts


At Noir you won’t find any of the standard bar food dishes. Instead, we appeal to a sophisticated palate with crispy pressed sandwiches, flavorful flatbread pizzas, fresh salads and several small bites to share. And the best part…you can order food until 11 pm (happy hour valid 5pm-7pm).

Noir’s menu changes seasonally and always offers a taste of the latest culinary musings.

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Happy Hour at Noir
